sentences.english: The United Nations Environment Programs (UNEP)highly praised the implement of ban for free plastic bags in China.
sentences.chinese: 联合国环境规划署盛赞中国实施“限塑令”。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhang Shigang is holding the position of UNEP Country Coordinator in China.
sentences.chinese: 张世钢先生现任联合国环境规划署驻华代表。

sentences.english: In year of 2010, Yuan was given the title of "Great Master of Environmental Art" by UNEP.
sentences.chinese: 年荣获联合国环境规划署授“环保艺术大师”称号。

sentences.english: The UNEP assessment is being paid for by Shell.
sentences.chinese: 联合国环境规划署的评估是由壳牌集团赞助的。
